original_title: Vavuniya birthday party arson and murder suspects handed over to CID
original_body_lines: Five suspects were arrested over the incident of setting fire to a house at Thonikkal in Vavuniya while a birthday party was in progress, where a couple was burnt to death and several others injured last week.
Vavuniya police and Vavuniya Division Crimes Investigation Unit launched investigations to arrest the suspects after a group of men set fire to the house on July 24.
A young couple was killed and nine others including children were injured and hospitalised in the incident.
Investigations revealed that a group of masked persons had come and set fire to the house due to a personal dispute while the owner was holding a party for his daughter's birthday.
The suspects, aged between 24 and 33 and residents of Vavuniya were arrested along with three motorcycles used for the incident.
Meanwhile, the IGP ordered the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) to take over the investigations into the incident.
Accordingly, the arrested suspects were handed over to the CID for further investigation.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
